posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Heya NwnwhiteBoy,

That is a cool build, but you may want to change the starting abilities and the level spread a bit, to make it more powerful. I would go for (Ranger 23/ Monk 2/ Cleric 15) in your case and avoid taking any Monk pre-epic. Go for straight Ranger 21 instead and grab "Bane of Enemies" a.s.a.p and then place the two Monk levels in 22nd and 37th levels.You do not need dodge or mobility in this build so avoid both if you can. You may also want to start as a Human to avoid the exp penalties and change your starting attributes to something like: (STR 08  DEX 17  CON 10  INT 13  WIS 16  CHA 08) that will end up like this: (STR 08  DEX 28  CON 10  INT 13  WIS 18  CHA 08), more skill points, less exp penalties, better hit points, better dexterity, more bab, better cleric buffs, one more feat and one more favored enemy to play with. Choose the domains with haste and improved invisibility for your Cleric and you set.

For your pre-epic feats go with: WP: Exotic, WF: Kamas, IC: Kamas, KD, IKD, Extend Spell, Blind Fighting and Weapon Finesse
For your Epic feats go with: EWF: Kama, Epic Prowess, Armour Skin, Bane of Enemies, Favored Enemy VI (Bonus Ranger), Great DEX I, Great WIS II
Final AB should be 43/ 45 (Against FE's)

Good Hunting!
